DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate QAX576 affect level interleukin 13 ( IL-13 ) patient idiopathic pulmonary fibrosis ( IPF ) .
DOC.criteria: Men woman age 40 80 year confirm diagnosis idiopathic pulmonary fibrosis Both men woman must nonchildbearing potential . Additional information regard requirement available screening . Capability meet certain lung function test screen Nonsmokers No participation another clinical study within 4 week study start . Certain medical condition may exclude candidate participation . Blood loss donation 400 mL within 2 month study start Significant illness ( respiratory ) within 2 week study start Past medical personal close family history clinically significant ECG abnormality Connective tissue disorder Active infection history systemic parasitic infection Known hypersensitivity drug . History immunocompromise , include positive HIV test result . History drug alcohol abuse within 12 month study start Any condition may compromise patient safety
